name: SetPlayerVirtualWorld
description: Set the virtual world of a player. They can only see other players or vehicles that are in that same world.

params_body.name: playerid
params_body.description: The ID of the player you want to set the virtual world of.

params_body.name: worldid
params_body.description: The virtual world ID to put the player in.

return_values:
1: The function executed successfully. 

 0: The function failed to execute. This means the player is not connected.
related_fn:
GetPlayerVirtualWorld: Check what virtual world a player is in.
 SetVehicleVirtualWorld: Set the virtual world of a vehicle.
